hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“If one of you were to lend his brother his land, it would be better for him than taking such and such rent for it.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي كِرَاءِ الأَرْضِ الْبَيْضَاءِ بِالذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Leasing Out Barren Land For Gold And Silver
